SELECT A.SABUN , B.EMP_NM , A.YMD , F_WTM_GET_ORG_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) AS ORG_NM, F_WTM_GET_FLEXIBLE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) AS FLEXIBLE_NM, F_WTM_GET_TIME_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) AS TIME_NM, A.ENTRY_SDATE , A.ENTRY_STYPE_CD , A.ENTRY_EDATE , A.ENTRY_ETYPE_CD , A.CHG_SDATE , A.CHG_EDATE , A.REASON , A.UPDATE_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE FROM WTM_INOUT_CHG_HIS A INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND A.YMD BETWEEN B.SYMD AND B.EYMD WHERE A.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD=#{enterCd} AND A.YMD BETWEEN REPLACE(#{sYmd}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{eYmd}, '-', '')
AND (A.SABUN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR B.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
